summary: A British radio operator is captured in occupied territory and forced to send messages back to London endangering allied forces.
cast: Curd Jürgens|Dawn Addams|Folco Lulli|René Deltgen|Dario Michaelis|Albert Lieven|Philippe Hersent|Lauro Gazzolo|Matteo Spinola|Ludovico Ceriana|Christopher Hofer|Alphonse Mathis|Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Stephen Garret|Edith Jost|Mary Olins|Adriano Uriani|Stefano Sibaldi
title: Londra chiama Polo Nord
